title: Kadhal Ennulle Lyrics Neram Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Kadhal Ennulle
Singer: Ranjith Govind
Movie: Neram
Music:Â Rajesh Murugesan		 .

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kadhal Ennulle
vandha neram ariyaamal
naatkal ippadi odudhey vazhvil
Naanum unnudan nadakira neram
innaalil,saalai athanai
azhagaai maarum

En veetai thidal aaki vizhayadum
paravai pol, manadhulle
vandhaaduvadhu yaaro

En swaasa araiyaagi
ennai thaangum udalaagi
uyirvazha kootiselvahu yaaro

Kadhal Ennulle
vandha neram ariyaamal
naatkal ippadi odudhey vazhvil
Naanum unnudan nadakira neram
innaalil,saalai athanai
azhagaai maarum

Arthamilla veenaana vaarthaigalai
naan pesum velayilum rasipaai

Azhavilla kadhalayum
endha sulalilum
naan ketkum munney tharuvaai

Unmuga dhasaigalil engae vetkam
ulladhendru nee pesum neramellam
naanum thaedi paarpen

Kulia kaaichal yedhum vandhaal
unnule naanum vandhaal
medhuvaai sriyaai adhu pogaadha

Vazhviniley,un moochu thoorathile
unnodu illai endraal thavippen
vazhum naatkalilum
aayul muludhilum
un vaasathiley pilaipen

En balam balaveenam ellam therinjaalum
un anbu vandha pinbu
en naanam maaripogum
en gunam gunaveenam unnodu serndhuvittal
nalamaai nalamaai adhu maaraadhaa!!

Kadhal ennulle ...

English Translation
I tried my best :)
